Comments_List: I have developed critical thinking on political situations and historical analysis of major wars based on Balance of Power theories. From this class, I can look at the international relations from the unique perspective of the balance of power. I am grateful to be part of the class, and greatly appreciate the opportunity of sharing my ideas in class and through response papers.

writing skills

the role of the nuclear weapon in respect to balance of power

My strength is that I love to engage in class through discussions, and I learn best through interactions. I love thinking about and analyzing international relations and study the history of wars. My weakness is that my writing skills still need improvement.
Yes; this class is highly organized; any idea is encouraged and respected in discussions.
Very useful for students who are willing to further proceed in studying political science because many fundamental concepts are clearly explained.
